blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: do you think Dan was joking in this clip? because no way he's actually that stupid youtu(.)be/_5j0RkTAFDw and even if he was...
question: do you think Dan was joking in this clip? because no way he's actually that stupid youtu(.)be/_5j0RkTAFDw and even if he was joking, which I'm not sure he was, it's still very irresponsible of him. next level hypocritical as well considering his very own situation
answer: I’ve seen this being passed around again and I’ve seen @thedemonphanti talking quite extensively about it and I pretty much agree with everything they’ve said on the matter. It’s hard to tell if it was meant as a joke or not but it was definitely irresponsible to feed into the conspiracy theories instead of just. I don’t know. Being happy for the dad-to-be?

reblog.comment: I’ve seen this being passed around again and I’ve seen @thedemonphanti talking quite extensively about it and I pretty much agree with everything they’ve said on the matter. It’s hard to tell if it was meant as a joke or not but it was definitely irresponsible to feed into the conspiracy theories instead of just. I don’t know. Being happy for the dad-to-be?

It’s hard to tell if it was meant as a joke or not but it was definitely irresponsible to feed into the conspiracy theories instead of just. I don’t know. Being happy for the dad-to-be?

blog.name: outphan
blog.title: i'm getting old and tired of chasing setting suns
blog.description:
viki (25) 🇭🇺~🇬🇧 this blog is a mess of posts i've already reblogged

multifandom

summary: 1. fic with secondary pairing - a very Lester christmas by cafephan (@cafephan). the secondary pairing is Martyn/Cornelia this...
body:
1. fic with secondary pairing - a very Lester christmas by cafephan (@cafephan). the secondary pairing is Martyn/Cornelia

this is so soft yet bantery, it’s just so on point. it’s great to see the easiness between Dan and the Lesters

2. first time - blooming like a flower laying next to me by glasseslouis

the details about Dan are just beautiful, making him look like an impressionist painting

3. italy trip - some kind of magic by dizzy and waveydnp (@alittledizzy and @waveydnp)

young boys in love, feeling horny, getting kinky. they are utter dorks

4. by new (2018+) author - ooh you make me live now honey by whatdoiknowx (@onedirectionticketss1)

this is just amazing, pure love, pure wonder pure Dan and Phil. it’s also funny, it’s also honest

5. sex toys - it felt wrong (but it didn’t take too long) by dipandpip (@dipnpips)

seeing Dani to slowly come to terms with her own sexuality, her getting more confident is just great

6. fic involving a dream - share your dreams with me by capriciouscrab (@capriciouscrab)

this is just pure beauty, the descriptions are so beautiful, the plot is simple but also so very raw

7. oral fixation - comfort by worriedpeach (@botanistlester)

I know it’s supposed to be about the oral fixation and/or the blowjob, but the descriptions of Dan’s depression are just hauntingly beautiful

8. honeymoon - paradise there upon your chest by luminaryhowell (@luminaryhowell)

so soft and so picturesque, their love and excitement for the new beginning is so pure and wonderful

9. 25th birthday - nothing else matters if I’ve got you by deary_you

soft and pure a bit sleepy and also gorgeous. seeing the difference between 21-year-old Dan and 25-year-old Dan from his own perspective is great

10. set in 2017 - up with the downpour by tortitabby (@tortitabby)

this is so soft and cosy and familiar. the descriptions are wonderful and the whole fic just feels so Phil

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Isnt dan into one direction ? (Or was) Like he make it look like a joke but he does really love them right ? He went to a...
question: Isnt dan into one direction ? (Or was) Like he make it look like a joke but he does really love them right ? He went to a concert and i think sing the songs and stuff? Maybe he is just very curious about all of that(the tinhat) like some humans can be. He shouldnt talk about it in front of people who look up to him but its not that bad to be curious about a popular thing, not like he is making the conspiracies himself
answer: I am not sure how Dan feels about One Direction. I remember him going to the concert with Louise and the other British YouTubers, but since I was never a follower of the band, I never paid attention to what he said about them. As for his comments, I think they were irresponsible, but at the time I doubt anyone could have predicted that people would say Louis’s son was a doll and everything else. I still can’t really defend Dan here completely, but I also don’t feel like I need to. A lot of people in the phandom put him up on a pedistal and then get upset when he doesn’t live up to their expectations or upset at others when they are critical of something he does. I think that’s all counterproductive and unfair. He’s a human who makes mistakes just like the rest of us and that realness is why I started watching him in the first place.

I still can’t really defend Dan here completely, but I also don’t feel like I need to. A lot of people in the phandom put him up on a pedistal and then get upset when he doesn’t live up to their expectations or upset at others when they are critical of something he does. I think that’s all counterproductive and unfair. He’s a human who makes mistakes just like the rest of us and that realness is why I started watching him in the first place.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: That clip made me briefly entertain the idea that he doesn't mind/he WANTS his audience to treat him like some of us do, what do...
question: That clip made me briefly entertain the idea that he doesn't mind/he WANTS his audience to treat him like some of us do, what do you think? was that just a slip up? was that just him being a bit of a hypocrite? what happened there?
answer: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

reblog.comment: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

trail.content_raw: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.
trail.content: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Ok so basically it means that me being interested in dan and phil personal life and relationship and wishing they were an actual...
question: Ok so basically it means that me being interested in dan and phil personal life and relationship and wishing they were an actual romantic couple wasnt a choice. I dont want to word it like this because it sound weird but its just what it is. No scientist ever studied why people ship and get obsessed over it (which touch such a lot of people) but i do believe it is something that tell how weird humans works. Being that invested in a ship is really similar to falling in love with someone and ik it
answer:
“Probably doenst make any sense but its really how i feel. To say if its just me because im weird or if others feels the same, that i dont know but i cant tell you im invested and i cant let go easily even thought i agree how wrong and fucked up it is. Also yes i have a life and have friends and do things so no thats not because i have no life if you were wondering uuuh yeah. If you want more explaination i can try or if you hate this sorry”

…

Oh boy.

I really don’t want to be rude here, but being invasive or creepy about somone else’s personal life is absolutely a choice. Just because you only see them on a screen doesn’t mean they aren’t actual real people, and it doesn’t mean that being overly curious or obsessed with their private lives is any less unacceptable.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Porn With Plot Masterlist
body:
All I Want for Christmas is You - scifiphan

Summary: It’s almost Christmas and all it takes is a cup of mulled wine for Dan to realise he has been in love with Phil all along.

And if anyone asks, you’re my best friend (ao3) - trickydoll

Summary: In which Phil gets a girlfriend, Dan is jealous, then Phil is sexually frustrated, so Dan gets him off.

Are You Mine? - phandomsub

Summary: Teaching was never Dan’s dream job. It’s just something he kind of stumbled into, but after working at Greenbrook Secondary for two years, he finds himself loving everything about it. Except for maybe the feelings he’s having for one of his students.

A Small Favor (ao3) - benotafraidofwriting

Summary: Dan’s friend, Harry Styles, is world-famous and hasn’t announced his engagement to the public yet. To stay incognito, Harry asks Dan to go to the wedding outfit designers for him. Dan agrees, not realizing this small favor will lead to something big…

Bruises & Bitemarks - phandomsub

Summary: Dan and Phil have been together for seven years. Their love used to feel so soft and sweet, but now all they seem to do is fight. The insults are getting worse and it’s starting to get physical. They both hate it, until they realise they love it

Confidence Looks Good On You (ao3) - librapinof

Summary: The fic where right after Dan and Phil get home from Phil getting his hair cut, Dan instils into Phil just how beautiful this new confidence is on him.

Dress Me Up & Watch Me Go (ao3) - phandomsub

Summary: Dan is sick of Phil’s grumpy mood, so he takes matters into his own hands by pulling out a pair of pretty rompers.

Duality (ao3) - melapplesphan

Summary: In which Phil has a thing for Pastel Dan, running his fingers through Dan’s curls, and telling Dan he’s beautiful. Equal parts fluff and smut. Please heed the tags.

Free birds shouldn’t be kept in cages (ao3) - sjakalen

Summary: Prison AU where Dan doesn’t know the rules of the game, and Phil is there to teach him.

Inmate Howell (ao3) - Analphancones

Summary: Dan Howell is in prison, and one of the guards happens to be his ex. What happens when old feelings of love and lust come back up from the past?

Just Can’t Get Enough Of You (ao3) - localopa

Summary: Dan runs an aesthetic porn blog that Phil’s been unknowingly jerking to for years. it all goes awry when he notices the sad dimple.

Nothing I Can See But You When You Dance - theshyauthor

Summary: Phil meets Dan at a club. They dance, get each other off in a restroom, get milkshakes, have sex again and eat pancakes together in exactly that order.

Only Love Can Hurt Like This - phandomsub

Summary: Phil Lester stumbles into a strip club with nothing to lose.

Open Your Heart to Me - succubusphan

Summary: When Dan accepted the offer to have a threesome with a friend and a Handsome stranger, he didn’t imagine what would happen.

Oral Fixation (ao3) - elena_stidham

Summary: “Forget the future. What makes me happy in the present if that’s something that I’m trying to achieve? Well, that’s pretty simple: laughter, food, and sex. ….So basically, stuff…coming in and out of my mouth, apparently.”

Personal Getaway (ao3) - librapinof

Summary: the fic where Phil takes Dan on a mini vacation to a personal villa in Italy where Phil treats Dan like the prince he is and romance & smut ensue on this personal getaway from a busy life.

Roll the Dice and Swear (ao3) - ramonaspeaks

Summary: Dan has a wet dream while sharing a hotel room with Phil.

Room Number Four (ao3) - somalester

Summary: Dan is afraid of going to the dentist and doesn’t know abut his pain kink yet, Phil is about to change that.

Sober (ao3) - elena_stidham

Summary: This was for their own good. This was for their own good. This was for their own good. This was for their own good. This was for their own good. This was for their own good. This was for their own—

Unspoken Rules (ao3) - AgingPhangirl

Summary: They have rules. 1. They don’t kiss. 2. They don’t talk about it. 3. They aren’t exclusive. 4. They don’t get attached. 5. It’s over when the tour is. As long as they abide by the rules, no one gets hurt. Simple, right?

Who’s Kinker Than Who Now? (ao3) - Analphancones

Summary: Dan and Phil wanna know who’s kinkier in bed, and a friendly argument about it leads to them wanting to prove who was the real winner.

blog.name: quercussp
blog.title: Just an oak tree
blog.description: 25, human flop. Ocassionaly NSFW. This is mostly a phan blog. I have a biology side blog @natureisweird. List of my fics on ao3. Masterlist of my fics and rec lists on Tumblr.

summary: Phanfic finder fest (part 3) - Card 2, Fics I am aware of
title: Phanfic finder fest (part 3) - Card 2, Fics I am aware of
body:
Click here for part 1.
Click here for part 2.

This is my second second card and a list of fics that I am already aware of. This was so so fun, and I can’t wait to finish the final part, which will be this second card but with fics that are new to me.

1. Coffee

the sun a souvenir (E, 11k) by deletable_bird - this fic is such a delight! It’s witty and funny and very sincere, Dan is so relatable and so lovable in this story, and his relationship with Louise is just adorable beyond words. Coffee plays a very central part in this story, along with paint and very awkward and lovely flirting. Give this a read, it’s absolutely great!

2. Vibrator

a ticket of the possibilities (M, 1.4k) by @callofthecurlew - an adorable fic about Dan looking at sex toys with Phil back in 2010. It’s just the right balance of funny and sweet and sexy, and has so many little details about their reactions to each other. I just love it so much!

3. Fic with a secondary pairing

December 4: purely by coincidence (G, 1.4k) by @alittledizzy - a phimmy AU because honestly we all need it. This fic makes the relationship seem so natural and so obvious, that it takes a minute to realize that it’s not how life turned out to be. There is something so inherently magical about Phil and Jimmy together, and I feel this story captures it perfectly.

4. Intercrural

Connected (M, 3.5k) by @auroraphilealis - a fic about Dan being young, in love and desperate for something they aren’t ready for and Phil being also young, in love and desperate, but feeling the responsibility of keeping his boyfriend safe and satisfied. I really love this fic because it just exudes young desperate love and that fire that a new relationship has. Plus, it’s so beautifully written and so emotional.

5. Cheating

sweet dreams (T, 1.9k) by @waveydnp - there’s no actual cheating in this fic, but I feel it’s still a really good fit for the prompt, because it really dives into what cheating is for different people and how communication in a partnership is important. The depth of this fic is absolutely stunning, and I definitely recommend this story to anyone who hasn’t read it yet.

6. Soulmates

paint it on your face (M, 574) by @onedirectionticketss1 (whatdoiknowx) - soulmates come in different shapes and sizes. This definitely really encapsulates the whole “Dan and Phil, best friends and soulmates” in a really really original way. An absolute treat to read, strongly recommend this one!

7. Warlock/magic au

just once to be lifted strong (T, 26k) by @leblonde - this is one of those fics that I couldn’t possibly describe adequately. If you haven’t read it, you need to do it ASAP. The fantasy elements in it are woven into the story so seamlessly and so gracefully, the characters are both absolutely novel and incredibly in character, and the whole story is just so musical and beautiful that now words can describe it.

8. ft. Martyn and Cornelia

Let Go Of The Reins (T, 81k) by @natigail - there are hundreds of amazing fics featuring Martyn and Cornelia in the phandom, but I really wanted to choose a kind of unexpected fic for this category and landed on this one. This is a horse riding AU, and I think it’s an absolutely stellar example of how meaningful and emotional you can make a relationship between siblings be. The brotherly love that Phil and Martyn share here is deep, real and very difficult and complex, much as it is in real life. The fic really goes deep into both Martyn’s and Cornelia’s character, and it’s just such a pleasure to read.

9. Songfic insp. by Lana del Rey

who you are and who you’ve been (T, 4.4k) by @kay-okays - aaah this fic is just absolutely perfect. I love how the conversation they are having is so so important, but it’s set up to be so lively and real with a little bit of mischief and so much delicate hesitation that you have when you’re in a new relationship that’s just making you so so happy. It’s like Dan kind of doesn’t believe in a way that you can be this happy. I just love it, such a beautiful fic!

10. Set in 2009

Turn and Face the Strange (NR, 2k) by @tortitabby - this 2009 fic really focuses on Phil’s relationship with Kath and the overwhelming love she has for her child. It’s very nuanced and very touching, and I really encourage everyone to give it a read, you won’t regret it!

a ticket of the possibilities (M, 1.4k) by @callofthecurlew - an adorable fic about Dan looking at sex toys with Phil back in 2010. It’s just the right balance of funny and sweet and sexy, and has so many little details about their reactions to each other. I just love it so much!

3. Fic with a secondary pairing

December 4: purely by coincidence (G, 1.4k) by @alittledizzy - a phimmy AU because honestly we all need it. This fic makes the relationship seem so natural and so obvious, that it takes a minute to realize that it’s not how life turned out to be. There is something so inherently magical about Phil and Jimmy together, and I feel this story captures it perfectly.

4. Intercrural

Connected (M, 3.5k) by @auroraphilealis - a fic about Dan being young, in love and desperate for something they aren’t ready for and Phil being also young, in love and desperate, but feeling the responsibility of keeping his boyfriend safe and satisfied. I really love this fic because it just exudes young desperate love and that fire that a new relationship has. Plus, it’s so beautifully written and so emotional.

5. Cheating

sweet dreams (T, 1.9k) by @waveydnp - there’s no actual cheating in this fic, but I feel it’s still a really good fit for the prompt, because it really dives into what cheating is for different people and how communication in a partnership is important. The depth of this fic is absolutely stunning, and I definitely recommend this story to anyone who hasn’t read it yet.

6. Soulmates

paint it on your face (M, 574) by @onedirectionticketss1 (whatdoiknowx) - soulmates come in different shapes and sizes. This definitely really encapsulates the whole “Dan and Phil, best friends and soulmates” in a really really original way. An absolute treat to read, strongly recommend this one!

7. Warlock/magic au

just once to be lifted strong (T, 26k) by @leblonde - this is one of those fics that I couldn’t possibly describe adequately. If you haven’t read it, you need to do it ASAP. The fantasy elements in it are woven into the story so seamlessly and so gracefully, the characters are both absolutely novel and incredibly in character, and the whole story is just so musical and beautiful that now words can describe it.

8. ft. Martyn and Cornelia

Let Go Of The Reins (T, 81k) by @natigail - there are hundreds of amazing fics featuring Martyn and Cornelia in the phandom, but I really wanted to choose a kind of unexpected fic for this category and landed on this one. This is a horse riding AU, and I think it’s an absolutely stellar example of how meaningful and emotional you can make a relationship between siblings be. The brotherly love that Phil and Martyn share here is deep, real and very difficult and complex, much as it is in real life. The fic really goes deep into both Martyn’s and Cornelia’s character, and it’s just such a pleasure to read.

9. Songfic insp. by Lana del Rey

who you are and who you’ve been (T, 4.4k) by @kay-okays - aaah this fic is just absolutely perfect. I love how the conversation they are having is so so important, but it’s set up to be so lively and real with a little bit of mischief and so much delicate hesitation that you have when you’re in a new relationship that’s just making you so so happy. It’s like Dan kind of doesn’t believe in a way that you can be this happy. I just love it, such a beautiful fic!

10. Set in 2009

Turn and Face the Strange (NR, 2k) by @tortitabby - this 2009 fic really focuses on Phil’s relationship with Kath and the overwhelming love she has for her child. It’s very nuanced and very touching, and I really encourage everyone to give it a read, you won’t regret it!

trail.content_raw:
Click here for part 1.
Click here for part 2.

This is my second second card and a list of fics that I am already aware of. This was so so fun, and I can’t wait to finish the final part, which will be this second card but with fics that are new to me.

1. Coffee

the sun a souvenir (E, 11k) by deletable_bird - this fic is such a delight! It’s witty and funny and very sincere, Dan is so relatable and so lovable in this story, and his relationship with Louise is just adorable beyond words. Coffee plays a very central part in this story, along with paint and very awkward and lovely flirting. Give this a read, it’s absolutely great!

2. Vibrator

a ticket of the possibilities (M, 1.4k) by @callofthecurlew - an adorable fic about Dan looking at sex toys with Phil back in 2010. It’s just the right balance of funny and sweet and sexy, and has so many little details about their reactions to each other. I just love it so much!

Get your seats comfy and your snacks ready as we explore the wonderful world of Dan & Phil! 
Interested? Visit our "Show Info" page to know how we do it or follow us on twitter for more updates!

summary: Just wanted to say thank you for all the fic finder lists, they're really great you have great taste. Honestly it's what is...
question: Just wanted to say thank you for all the fic finder lists, they're really great you have great taste. Honestly it's what is getting me through this hiatus, so thank you very much :)
answer: aw, thank you dear anon! thanks to all the amazing people participating in the fest, there is so many amazing lists out there:)
